titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives upon the death on September 3, 2003, of the late General Raymond G. Davis (United States Marine Corps, retired) and expressing the appreciation and admiration of the House for the unwavering commitment demonstrated by General Davis to his family, the Marine Corps, and the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 9/9/2003--Introduced. Extends the condolences of the House of Representatives to the family of General Raymond G. Davis (United States Marine Corps, retired) who died on September 3, 2003, and expresses appreciation for his unwavering commitment to his family, the Marine Corps, and the Nation.
